title: The Fundamentals of Long Distance Relationship: Things You Need to Know About Long Distance Relationships (LDR) and Tips How to Make it Work
description: This book will show you the best way to have a long-distance relationship, thereby providing you with the right guide to overcome some LDR issues. The easy to follow tips and guidelines stated in this book will help your long distance relationship not just survive the huge gap, they'll additionally help you establish a solid framework for a relationship that is fun, satisfying and fruitful! This is a must-have book for anyone that wishes to avoid common pitfalls in long distance relationships.
author: Lisa Daniel
